  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_112714</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_112714</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Induced dipole attractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verursachte Dipolanziehungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attractions induites de dipöle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atrações induzidas do dipole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazioni indotte del dipolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκληθείσα έλξη διπόλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracciones inducidas del dipolo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows induced dipole attractions in neighbouring atoms or molecules. This is due to instantaneous electric dipole as atoms or molecules lie on one side of the other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dipole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric dipoles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">van der Waal's forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt verursachte Dipolanziehungen
in benachbarten Atomen oder in Molekülen. Dieses liegt am 
blitzschnellen elektrischen Dipol, da Atome oder Moleküle auf einer 
Seite von der anderen liegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les attractions 
induites de dipöle en atomes ou molécules voisins. C'est dû 
au dipöle électrique instantané car les atomes ou les molécules se
trouvent d'un côté de l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra atrações induzidas do 
dipole em átomos ou em moléculas neighbouring. Isto é  devido
ao dipole elétrico instantâneo porque os átomos ou as moléculas se
encontram em um lado do outro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le attrazioni indotte 
del dipolo in atomi o molecole vicini. Ciò è dovuto il dipolo 
elettrico istantaneo poichè gli atomi o le molecole si trovano da un 
lato dell'altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει προκληθείσα έλξη διπόλων
στα γειτονικά άτομα ή τα μόρια. Αυτό οφείλεται στο 
στιγμιαίο ηλεκτρικό δίπολο ως άτομα ή τα μόρια βρίσκονται σε 
μια πλευρά άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra atracciones inducidas 
del dipolo en átomos o moléculas vecinos. Esto es debido al 
dipolo eléctrico instantáneo pues los átomos o las moléculas 
mienten en una cara de la otra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dipol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Dipole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">van Der Waals Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dipöle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dipöles électriques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Électrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forces de van der Waal's</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dipole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dipoles elétricos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elétrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">forças de camionete der Waal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dipolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dipoli elettrici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elettroni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forze del van der Waal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έλξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δίπολο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικά δίπολα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαν δερ Waal's δυνάμεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">atracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dipolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dipolos eléctricos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Electrones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
